context_of_use: The admin modifies system-wide settings and configuration parameters to customize the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Control system access and customization
description: The admin modifies system-wide settings and configuration parameters.
triggering_event: Admin requests to configure system settings.
preconditions: Admin is logged into the system.
Admin has the necessary permissions to configure settings.
assumptions: The admin has the required permissions to perform configuration.
requirements_met: The system shall allow the admin to configure system settings.
outstanding_issues: Need to define specific configuration parameters that can be modified.
main_flow: 1. Admin requests to configure system settings → System displays configuration options.
2. Admin modifies desired settings → System validates changes.
3. Admin confirms changes → System saves the updated settings.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the changes are invalid, then the system displays an error message and prompts the admin to correct the input.
